Statute.Title: Nuclear Liability and Compensation Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Responsabilité et l’indemnisation en matière nucléaire, Loi sur la)

Terminology.Text: Terminology, 2015, c. 4, s. 127 (replace “Nuclear Liability Reinsurance Account” with “Nuclear Liability Account” in any other Act or Regulation

Item.Text: — s. 1, the definitions “approved insurer”, “nuclear fuel”, nuclear incident”, “nuclear installation” — except for the words “other than in the definition “Installation State” and subparagraphs 9(1)(b.1)(i) and (b.2)(i) and 9(4)(b)(i) and (c)(i) of the English version” — “nuclear material”, “nuclear reactor”, “operator”, “radioactive products or waste” and “Tribunal” in s. 2, ss. 3 to 8, par. 9(1)(a), subpar. 9(1)(b)(i) and (ii), par. 9(1)(c) — except when the combination is in relation to materials referred to in subpar. 9(1)(b)(iii) or (iv) or par. 9(1)(b.1) or (b.2) — ss. 9(2) and (3), 10 to 18, 20, 22 to 26, 27(1) and (4), 28 to 33, 34(1), (2) and (6), 35 to 40, 41(1) and (2), 42 to 49, 51 to 67, 68(1) and (3), 69, 70 and 77, par. 78(a), (b), (e) and (f) and ss. 79 and 80, as enacted by s. 120, in force 01.01.2017 see SI/2016-23

— the definitions “Contracting State”, “Convention”, “Installation State”, the words “other than in the definition “Installation State” and subpar. 9(1)(b.1)(i) and (b.2)(i) and 9(4)(b)(i) and (c)(i) of the English version” in the definition “nuclear installation” and the definition “public funds” in s. 2, subpar. 9(1)(b)(iii) and (iv), par. 9(1)(b.1) to (c) — when the combination is in relation to materials referred to in subpar. 9(1)(b)(iii) or (iv), par. 9(1)(b.1) or (b.2) — ss. 9(4) to (6), 19, 21, 27(2) and (3), 34(3) to (5), 41(3), 50, 68(2), 71 to 76 and par. 78(c) and (d), and the schedule, as enacted by s. 120, in force 01.01.2017 (the Convention on Supplementary Compensation for Nuclear Damage, as defined in s. 2, came into force 15.04.2015) see SI/2016-23
